rubric.above: Our Korean teacher is joined today by ...
rubric.below: Michael Jordan and Billie Jean King.

panel.above: Featuring Michael Jordan from The Chicago Bulls
panel.below: He is quite like LeBron James in this regard -- Ed.

panel.above: And Billie Jean King from California

balloon.content: I just love delivering forehand slams.

panel.below: Think of her as a female version of John McEnroe -- Ed.
